title: How much has Obama made in his time as president? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: See for yourself. Presidential Tax Returns Obama earned $5.6 million in 2009, the first year of his presidency, and $1.7 million in 2010, largely because of royalties from sales of his books. For the next five years he earned well less than a million per year, mostly from his salary as President. There is no 2016 tax return listed. Maybe he decided not to release it since he was already out of office by the time that it was filed. It would be interesting to see how the current office holder compares, especially in the category of earnings by virtue of being President, in addition to the standard salary. I recall that Trump promised to release his returns, didn’t he?
